Uses of Class
Publication

  • Uses of Publication in Unnamed Package

    Subclasses of Publication in Unnamed Package
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    Book
    A Book class that contains information specific for books, able to hold the genre and number of pages of a publication, in addition to the data held by the parent class Publication
    class 
    Magazine
    A Magazine class that contains information specific for magazines, able to hold the genre and number of pages of a publication, in addition to the data held by the parent class Publication
